title: When i open lol it says repairing
body:
Ok look please I was playing on my friend's account 
Then I decided to open my account when I closed his account and opened mine it says "Repairing" and when it finishes loading it just doesn't open please help!

replies.body: i got same problem today, when i opened LoL it says "repairing" and after this i cant join any game or reconnect, how i can fix it?

Do you have a screenshot of this messaging?  It sounds like your client picked up some bad game files, but might not have permission to fix them up.  I suggest starting with the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if it helps!
i do have but i don't know how to upload it on this site
